title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 636-1.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 636-1.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart
applies to: (1)

Medicaid Home and Community

Based Services (HCBS) that are operated, certified, funded, or subject to
oversight by OPWDD; and
(2)

Care

Management, by whatever name known, that is subject to oversight by OPWDD and
provided to individuals who receive HCBS that are operated, certified, funded, or subject to oversight by OPWDD. (b) This subpart applies to the assessment of
functional and healthrelated needs process and the service planning process for
all services approved, authorized, certified and/or funded by OPWDD. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
636-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
